alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 26 at 4:35AM PST until December 28 at 3:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions, including during the evening commute on Monday. Tree branches could fall as well. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 4000 to 4500 feet, with localized amounts up to 16 inches above 6500 feet, are possible. * WHERE...San Bernardino County and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Monday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant reductions in visibility are possible. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
